attributes.action: hold a referendum on the European Treaty (Constitution) as he gave the people of this country his word that he would.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown promised the people of this country a referendum on the European constitution. For all intents and purposes the Treaty is the same. He knows it, so much so he didnt want to sign it with the other European leaders, so he should stand by his word and let the country decide.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
